seo.title: Products | Chicago Foods
seo.description: At Chicago Foods, we are committed to providing high-quality corn-based products. We transform your ideas into products that create value and trust.

heroText: offers the industrial market a complete line of yellow corn-based products, with high quality standards and uniform particle size.

products.name: Fine Cornmeal
products.description: Product with high dispersion and absorption, ideal for fermented formulations and baking.

products.name: Fine Grain Cornmeal
products.description: Product with soft texture and uniform color, ideal for traditional recipes and industrial applications requiring refined finish.

products.name: Italian Cornmeal
products.description: Full-bodied texture with a gourmet touch, suitable for traditional recipes and modern industrial processes.

products.name: Gritz 1
products.description: Fine granularity product, ideal for industrial processes requiring uniformity and good flowability.

products.name: Gritz 2
products.description: Versatile for applications requiring a balance between structure and solubility.

products.name: Gritz 3
products.description: Larger particles, ideal for formulations requiring structure retention and lower immediate solubility.

products.name: MixPro
products.description: Blend developed to offer a balance between solubility and structure, combining characteristics of two different granulations.

products.name: Small Hominy
products.description: Robust and traditional product with texture ideal for ready-to-eat food preparation.

products.name: Hominy
products.description: Medium grain, ideal for sweet preparations and industrial gourmet dishes.

products.name: Large Hominy
products.description: Large grain product, suitable for preparations requiring consistent texture and characteristic corn flavor.

products.name: Animal Nutrition - Corn Germ
products.description: Noble corn byproduct, rich in nutrients, recommended for nutritional enrichment and high value-added formulations.
